Html: As I was playing with gear options for my Shadow Priest I noticed that hit gear kept getting prioritized even though I am capped.  After digging further I saw that it did register me as Shadow capped but not Holy capped.  To test I equipped hit gear to get over the Holy cap and priority changed the gear drastically.  I'm shadow.  Casting a holy spell is against my religion (pun intended).  Is there a way to make Rawr disreguard the Holy cap and only register the Shadow Cap?  I looked around the program but couldn't find a solution other than equipping hit gear to trick it.

Try doing this instead: Go into options, lower fight length to 5 or 4 minutes and try again.

 

If that does not improve the situation, please make a post in the issues forum with your Character.xml so I can take a closer look!
It appears that changing the fight length did change the priority.  Now I'm curious why length would affect that?
Could you post your Character.xml in the Issues section of the site, so that I may take a closer look at why it would do that.
